title: 80's retro style metal/glam font?
content:
I'm looking for a font in a similar style to this one, but clean as opposed to eroded. Doesn't have to be exactly like this, but I think you'll know what I mean just by seeing it. That 80's metal/glam style.

[http://www.dafont.com/birth-of-a-hero.font?nb\_ppp=50](http://web.archive.org/web/20110301112702/http:/www.dafont.com/birth-of-a-hero.font?nb_ppp=50 "http://www.dafont.com/birth-of-a-hero.font?nb\_ppp=50")

Thanks!
author: staybeautiful

comments.content:
Avant Garde/Avant Garde Alternates.

Available at fontshop.com
